h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice
img_above_text:
# The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
## Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice

Once enough damage has been sustained to its leg, you'll see its leg start to explode with light, meaning your attacks have successfully staggered the boss. He'll fall to the ground in a heap, with its sphere-like core right in front of you.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the boss fight against Captain Wise-Voice in "The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm." The boss, a large, twisted creature, has been staggered and is lying on the ground with its core exposed, glowing with light. The game's interface shows the boss's health bar and various player stats and abilities.
